results.name: List coordinates (x,y) of the points in an hexagonal grid, sorted first by radial coordinate r and in case of ties, by polar angle 0 <= phi < 2*Pi in a polar coordinate system. Sequence gives the third coordinate in a barycentric coordinate system.
comment: Cartesian coordinates (x,y) of the grid points are converted to barycentric coordinates (i,j,k) by i = x - y/sqrt(3), j = 2*y/sqrt(3), k = x + y/sqrt(3). The sequence gives k. i is given in A307014, j is given in A307016.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9060, covering range r <= 50.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Mar 21 2019
